title: AR-Based Intelligent Network Cabling Practical Training Course [K-12]

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic VLAN and Network Switching Concepts, Experience with Physical Cabling Tasks
context.additional_context: Practical training centered on virtual equipment resembling real switching racks in an augmented reality (AR) environment, with an intelligent tutoring system (ITS) for tracking individual progress.

learning_goals: Learners can perform four types of VLAN cabling tasks with 90% accuracy by following AR interface guidance.
Learners can diagnose and correct error causes within three attempts using real-time feedback from ITS (Intelligent Tutoring Systems).
Learners can independently reconstruct standard cabling procedures without instructions by utilizing checklists and summary information.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
